DataElement.preferredName: Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Previous Biopsy Evaluation Change Response Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term that represents the change in disease response from a previous biopsy evaluation of cGVHD (chronic Graft vs. Host Disease).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Previous Biopsy Evaluation Change Disease Response
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._Occurring prior to something else._The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis._Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A graft versus host disease with symptoms appearing more than 100 days post-transplant.

Concepts.definition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.

Property.preferredName: Previous Biopsy Evaluation Change Disease Response
Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring prior to something else.:The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.:Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

Concepts.definition: The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NIH Score CRF as requested by Y. Yakovlev. mc 11/20/16

ValueDomain.preferredName: Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Response Change Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A starting point to which things may be compared.: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: A starting point to which things may be compared.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No change in chronic Graft versus Host Disease (cGVHD)  progression during the preceding 3 months.

Concepts.definition: No change in chronic Graft versus Host Disease (cGVHD) progression during the preceding 3 months.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that something improved.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that something improved.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: No Prior or Current Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease

ValueMeaning.preferredName: No Prior or Current Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: Earlier in time or order.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Occurring in or belonging to the present time.

A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.
